articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Polish Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Polish Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Polish Ambassador to the DPRK Edward Pietrzyk, who paid a farewell call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Work in Different Fields in Kanggye City
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Work in Different Fields in Kanggye City
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of work in different fields in Kanggye City.
					 After being briefed on the master plan for the construction of Kanggye City newly worked out to implement the on-the-spot instructions given by supreme leader Kim Jong Un, the premier looked round the construction site of the gymnasium of Jagang Province and the Jangjagang People's Pleasure Park, the Inphung Folk Garden, etc. to acquaint himself in detail with the city construction and beautification.
					
					 He visited the Kanggye Winery, the Kanggye Pig Farm, the Hungju Chicken Farm and the Kanggye Wood Processing Factory to learn about production capacity, technical updating and supply and production of feed for domestic animals. He held a consultative meeting with officials concerned.
					
					 He underscored the need for the industrial establishments in Kanggye City to glorify the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and work out a right business strategy and put enterprise management on a scientific basis as required by their actual conditions.
					
					 The meeting took measures for increasing the competitiveness of products and comprehensive utility rate of timber, putting the breeding and care of domestic animals on a scientific basis and sufficiently supplying materials needed for city construction.
					
					 Earlier, the premier visited different places including the Hwaphung Coal Mine under the Anju Area Coal Mining Complex and held a consultative meeting.
					
					 The meeting underlined the position and role of the complex and took measures for concentrating efforts on increasing coal production and called on the relevant domains to supply electricity and materials necessary for coal production on a preferential basis.

articles.title: Head of DPRK Delegation Speaks at IMO General Assembly
articles.content:
Head of DPRK Delegation Speaks at IMO General Assembly
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The head of the DPRK delegation made a speech at the 28th general assembly of the International Maritime Organization (IMO) on November 26.
					 He referred to the significance of the assembly and the achievements made in maritime security as well as the work of the Secretariat of the IMO for improving its work in line with the requirements and interests of its member states.
					
					 The prevailing situation requires the IMO to increase its responsibility and role for guaranteeing the security of the marine transport which plays an important role in world trade and creating clear sea environment, he said, mentioning the issues to be settled by the IMO and its member states.
					
					 Noting that under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un all people in the DPRK are waging a general onward movement for building a thriving socialist nation, he went on:
					
					 The DPRK government is taking practical measures to reenergize the overall economy of the country in order to promote economic construction and improve the people's living standard at an early date, and, at the same time, channeling big efforts into developing marine transport which is of weighty significance in economic development.
					
					The DPRK, in particular, has achieved a series of successes in implementing major conventions and rules newly adopted by the IMO.
					
					 It has made progress in the work for implementing the "2012 Manila Convention." It is improving the system of quality control of maritime administration by revising domestic laws and regulations and increasing the role of the maritime certification organ in order to carry out the international conventions and rules that had been modified and effectuated.
					
					 It deployed ultra-short wave coastal radio stations in 25 appropriate places along the eastern and western coasts of the country for maritime detecting and rescue and is making preparations for successfully establishing the system of long-range identification and tracking of ships by operating the stations from next year.
					
					 It accessed to the International Convention on Moving Satellite Organization on October 15, performing its mission as a member state of the organization in close touch with it for marine security.
					
					 It is also pushing ahead with the work to create clear maritime environment in keeping with the increase of state investment in maritime environmental protection.
					
					 The DPRK government will as ever boost the relations of friendship and cooperation with the member states of the IMO in the invariable idea of its foreign policy-- independence, peace and friendship-- and make a positive contribution to the global efforts for navigation safety and maritime environmental protection.

articles.title: Christian Federation of Korea Supports S. Korean Religionists
articles.content:
Christian Federation of Korea Supports S. Korean Religionists 
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Central Committee of the Christian Federation of Korea Monday made public a statement bitterly denouncing the south Korean puppet authorities' harsh suppression of the progressive and democratic forces and the medieval racket to "eliminate forces following the north" as an unpardonable act of treachery. 
					 The present situation in south Korea reminds one of the "yusin" dictatorship era in which the aspiration for national unity was ruthlessly suppressed amid the whirlwind of fascism and dictatorship, and anti-communism and confrontation with fellow countrymen became the "national policy", the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The remnants of "yusin" dictatorship regime held the posts of power by employing every possible intrigue and are making a desperate bid to reverse history. 
					
					 It is clear if this development is overlooked, south Korea will go back to the medieval era of darkness and turn into the tundra where dream for democracy is repressed. 
					
					 Maintenance of justice is the way out but submission to injustice leads to death. It is a lesson shown by the distressful history of south Korea interwoven with fascism and dictatorship. 
					
					 Conscientious Christians should bravely turn out in the just and sacred struggle to punish the group of Satans that brings the disaster of a nuclear war to this land after making south Korea a theater of fascist rowdyism, while checking reconciliation and unity of compatriots. 
					
					 The group of vicious evils hurting the fellow countrymen, being forsaken by public mindset, will never be able to evade the punishment by Heaven and history. 
					
					 Christians in the DPRK will as ever stand by the Christians in south Korea who value love, justice and peace in their actions to bring new democratized society.

articles.title: Events Mark World AIDS Day
articles.content:
Events Mark World AIDS Day
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Events took place in the Grand People's Study House and the National Hygienic and Anti-epidemic Center on Monday on the World AIDS Day.
					 Present there were officials of ministries, national institutions and social organizations and those in the field of public health and members of different missions of international bodies including the representative of the World Health Organization to the DPRK.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers referred to the importance of the work for preventing infection by AIDS virus and reducing the number of mortality by AIDS.
					
					 They stressed the need to intensify activities for preventing AIDS in close touch with the international bodies including WHO and UN AIDS Organization.
					
					 The participants watched a video on the prevention of AIDS and activities of consulting and examining AIDS conducted by the National Hygienic and Anti-epidemic Center.

articles.title: DPRK Marathoner Wins at 2013 Macao Int'l Marathon
articles.content:
DPRK Marathoner Wins at 2013 Macao Int'l Marathon 
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK woman marathoner Kim Mi Gyong took the first place at the 2013 Macao International Marathon. She entered the finish line at 02:36:32 on Sunday.
					 The 32nd one brought together about 6 000 runners and fans from 47 countries and regions. 
					
					 It was held divided into marathon, half marathon and mini marathon.

articles.title: Tennis Games of Officials Begin
articles.content:
Tennis Games of Officials Begin
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The tennis games of officials of commissions, ministries and national institutions began at the Taekwon-Do Hall, the gymnasium of Kim Chaek University of Technology and the Moranbong Gymnasium on Monday.
					 More than 500 selected players are taking part in the games.
					
					 Being divided into four groups, they will compete on a knock-out basis. 
					
					 On the first day the players showed high skills.
					
					 From Tuesday the teams belonging to groups A and B will compete in the Taekwon-Do Hall and those belonging to groups C and D in the gymnasium of Kim Chaek University of Technology.

articles.title: Pakyon Area Face-lifted
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Flailed for Trying Hard to Conceal Truth about Election Rigging
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., on Nov. 25 carried an article contributed by a Korean in the U.S. denouncing the south Korean puppet chief executive for working hard to conceal the truth about the interference in the illegal election.
					 Koreans in the U.S. are becoming increasingly vocal demanding the resignation of Park Geun Hye, terming the past "presidential election" fraudulent election in which government power interfered, the article said.
					
					 It accused Park Geun Hye of sidestepping all sorts of frauds during the election, ruthlessly cracking down on those disturbing her and making desperate efforts to evade the blame for it at any cost.
					
					 The behavior of the chief executive to conceal the truth about the case is the height of shamelessness, it stressed.

articles.title: Mirim Riding Club in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Mirim Riding Club in Pyongyang
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The Mirim Riding Club in the suburbs of Pyongyang draw a number of visitors every day.
					 The club, with an area of 60-odd hectares, has all necessary facilities for riding lessons, including outdoor and indoor training grounds and health recovery and service centers.
					
					 Trainers of the club kindly teach its visitors the arts of riding such as how to tame and run a horse.
					
					 The indoor training ground, 59.4 meters in length and 28 meters in width, is used mainly by aged persons and children and the outdoor training ground with 1 750m-long earth-sand track and 1 850m-long lawn track by young people.
					
					 In the outdoor training ground there are pavilions, man-made waterfalls and pond teeming with sturgeon and Ryongjong fish and a tented resting place.
					
					 After taking riding lessons, visitors to the club can have a steam bath at the service center and get various services at the recovery center, which houses a gym, massage room and others.
					
					 Kim Jong Sim, a guide of the club, told KCNA:
					
					 After the start of its operation, a large number of people have visited the club, some of them once in a week or almost every day. Among the visitors were bridal couples.
					
					 I feel pride of working at the club, seeing the visitors enjoy a pleasant time here.
					
					 Ri Won Chol, a citizen living in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province, said:
					
					 I and all my family members have just got service at the health recovery center after taking riding lessons. Now, I feel very refreshed.
					
					 It's my firm belief that a thriving nation will be surely built in this land under the guidance of the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Not only local people but also foreign visitors expressed admiration at the excellent facilities of the club, hoping that the DPRK would make greater achievements in building a highly-civilized powerful nation.

articles.title: Seasoned Rice Rolled in Laver
articles.content:
Seasoned Rice Rolled in Laver
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- From olden times, seasoned rice rolled in laver has been considered as one of Korea's traditional dishes.
					 An old book says the Korean people took rice rolled in raw laver together with soybean paste.
					
					 At present, the rice is rolled in dried laver with various kinds of side dishes.
					
					 The laver-rolled rice, smart in the look with peculiar flavor and taste, is regarded as one of necessities for picnic.
					
					 It is now enjoying popularity in Pyongyang and local cities in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 In Pyongyang, Moran Restaurant, located on Moran Hill, has carved out a reputation as the best cook for it.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK-China Agreement Marked in China
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK-China Agreement Marked in China
 Beijing, December 1 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Commerce and the Ministry of Culture of China jointly hosted a reception on November 29 to mark the 60th anniversary of the inter-governmental agreement on cooperation in economy and culture between the DPRK and China.
					 Present there on invitation were DPRK Ambassador to China Ji Jae Ryong and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 A vice-minister of Commerce and other officials of the ministries of Commerce, Culture, Foreign Affairs and the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China attended.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The vice-minister of Commerce said that the Sino-Korean friendship had been provided and cultivated by the leaders of the elder generations of the two countries. Premier Zhou Enlai and President Kim Il Sung signed the agreement 60 years ago, providing a framework for cooperation between the two countries in the fields of economy, transport, culture and education, he added, stressing this helped steadily consolidate the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation.
					
					 He noted with pleasure that the Korean people have achieved positive successes under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Marshal Kim Jong Un. The party and people of China are making efforts to open the wider avenue of the socialist cause with the Chinese characteristics, he stressed.
					
					 The DPRK ambassador said that over the past six decades the agreement greatly helped the two countries push ahead with socialist construction, support and cooperate with each other in various fields including economy and culture and develop the friendly relations.
					
					 He expressed expectation that the Chinese people would carry out the tasks set forth at the 3rd plenary meeting of 18th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China under the guidance of the CPC with Xi Jinping as its general secretary and thus achieve greater successes in the drive of realizing the dream of China and building socialism with the Chinese characteristics.
					
					 Referring to the dynamic struggle waged by the Korean people in building a thriving socialist nation and improving the standard of people's living under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, the ambassador expressed the belief that the traditional DPRK-China friendship provided and cultivated by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il together with the Chinese leaders of the elder generations would further develop onto a higher stage as desired by the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: DPRK-China Fine Art Exhibition Opens in China
articles.content:
DPRK-China Fine Art Exhibition Opens in China
						
 Beijing, December 1 (KCNA) -- A DPRK-China joint fine art exhibition was opened in Beijing on November 30 under the co-sponsorship of the Mansudae Art Studio and the House of Oriental Culture and Arts of China.
					 Displayed at the venue were Korean paintings, oil paintings and graphic paintings showing the Korean people's efforts for building a thriving nation, their happy life, beautiful scenery of Songun Korea and the DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 Also displayed there were fine art pieces on the theme of Sino-DPRK friendship created by Chinese artists.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were officials of the Chinese Ministry of Culture and the House of Oriental Culture and Arts, Chinese artists and fans and the staff members of the DPRK embassy in Beijing and the delegation of the Mansudae Art Studio on a visit to China.
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					 Cultural exchanges serve as a bond linking the minds of the peoples of the two countries and a major component of the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations the speakers said. This helped lay a solid foundation for the development of the bilateral relations.
					
					 They admired DPRK artists for successfully creating truthful, simple, beautiful and graceful fine art pieces.
					
					 The exhibition would show the development and social progress of the two countries as it deepens bilateral friendship and further activates the exchange between artists, they noted, expressing their determination to achieve greater success through continued cultural and art exchanges and cooperation and thus make tangible contribution to the prosperity of the two countries with art.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il's Outlook on Homeland, Revolution and People
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il's Outlook on Homeland, Revolution and People
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are the peerless patriots, great revolutionaries and benevolent fathers of the people who dedicated their all only to the country, revolution and the people, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 Noting Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's outlook on the homeland, revolution and people is most scientific and perfect in its essence and contents, the article goes on:
					
					 It was Kim Il Sung's outlook on the homeland that it is the cradle of life for all the members of the nation irrespective of their class and strata and the basic unit where they shape their destiny.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's outlook on the homeland was that the socialist homeland led by an outstanding leader is, indeed, the genuine one where people's happiness is eternally guaranteed.
					
					 Their outlook on revolution is characterized by their immutable faith that the sacred struggle to realize the independence of the popular masses is sure to triumph, unshakable attitude that they can not tolerate even the slightest concession in the revolutionary principles despite any difficulties and their will to carry forward the revolution to the end generation after generation.
					
					 The outlook on the people of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il regarded the people as the most precious, powerful and wisest existence in the world and saw that the homeland and revolution are necessary for them. It also viewed the popular masses as the masters of everything and everything in society as a means for serving them. The essence of their outlook on the people was that the people's demand and interests are the absolute yardsticks to be adhered to in revolution and construction and that even a star in the sky should be picked up if it is desired by people.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were, indeed, the greatest men not only for their revolutionary idea, love for the country and its people and rare leadership traits but for the great exploits they performed on behalf of the country and nation, era and history. Kim Il Sung founded the undying Juche idea and Songun idea and Kim Jong Il ceaselessly developed them as required by the developing era and revolution and provided the great guiding idea and guideline in the era of independence. This is their distinguished exploits which paved a broad road for carrying out the cause of independence of the country and nation and humanity. Kim Il Sung led the two fierce revolutionary wars against the imperialists to victory.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il demonstrated only victory in a war minus gun report with imperialists for more than half a century and turned the country into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence. Kim Jong Il ushered in the greatest heyday in all fields of revolution and construction under the banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism. He also ushered in the great new era of building a thriving nation by pursuing original Songun politics.
					
					 Such exploits Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by leading the party and revolution for decades are unprecedented in history and will be of no match in the future, either.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Dismisses U.S. Initiative to Build "World without Nuclear Weapons" as Hypocritical
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Dismisses U.S. Initiative to Build "World without Nuclear Weapons" as Hypocritical 
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. talk about "nuclear disarmament" is full of lies and rhetoric, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is the world's biggest nuclear weapons state and a nuclear war criminal state which brought nuclear disaster to humankind for the first time in the world. Therefore, the U.S. has greater obligation as regards the issue of nuclear disarmament than any other countries.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the U.S. is persistently pursuing a nuclear war policy in disregard of commitments under international law including the NPT.
					
					 By origin, the U.S. initiative to build "a world without nuclear weapons" contravenes its foreign policy.
					
					 It is needless to say that the U.S. can hardly be interested in building "a world without nuclear weapons" as it regards nuclear weapons as a means to realize its ambition to dominate the world.
					
					 The U.S. has pressed forward the development and production of new type nuclear weapons with a goal to hold nuclear supremacy and carry out its nuclear war strategy.
					
					 The U.S. is keen to make nuclear weapons usable in all wars like conventional weapons.
					
					 After proclaiming a preemptive attack as its state policy and designating various countries as its targets of nuclear attack the U.S. is stepping up in real earnest the preparations for mounting a preemptive nuclear attack on those countries at any moment.
					
					 The danger of a thermonuclear war is increasing day by day worldwide owing to the U.S. arms buildup under the signboard of building "a world without nuclear weapons".
					
					 The above-said initiative of the U.S. is nothing but a smokescreen for covering up its moves to realize the ambition to dominate the world by dint of nuclear supremacy.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula is fraught with the greatest danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 Having put the DPRK on the list of preemptive nuclear attack the U.S. nuclear war maniacs are threatening the DPRK to make a preemptive nuclear attack without any advanced warning.
					
					 The U.S. had better stop paying lip-service to nuclear disarmament but show it in practice, the article concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S., S. Korean Warmongers of Straining Situation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S., S. Korean Warmongers of Straining Situation 
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Some time ago, the U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities held a meeting of the committee for bolstering up capability for missile counteractions and worked out a joint strategy under the pretext of coping with the "missile threat" from someone. Meanwhile, the commander of the U.S.-south Korea combined forces said at a meet-the press that a proposal for establishing a south Korea-U.S. combined division is in the pipeline. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The moves of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers to tighten the military nexus are a grave military provocation to aggravate the situation on the Korean Peninsula and increase the danger of a war. 
					
					 The joint strategy worked out by them under the pretext of the non-existent "missile threat" from the DPRK is a revelation of their scenario for preemptive attack on it. 
					
					 This move is aimed at more perfectly rounding off the system for preemptive missile strike at the DPRK. 
					
					 Their projected south Korea-U.S. combined division amounts to an undisguised military threat to the DPRK. 
					
					 They are going mad with their moves to make the start of a nuclear war against the north an established fact and put them into practice. 
					
					 No matter how vociferously they may talk about the "threat" from the DPRK and "defense commitment" to cover up their wicked war scenario, they can never mislead public opinion at home and abroad. 
					
					 Their much-touted theory of "threat" is another version of the theory for preemptive attack on the north. 
					
					 The prevailing grave situation on the Korean Peninsula once again eloquently proves how just and far-sighted the DPRK was when it bolstered up its war deterrence despite all difficulties.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Demands Repeal of "Security Law" in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Demands Repeal of "Security Law" in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The repeal of the "Security Law" (SL) presents itself as an urgent task which brooks no further delay in south Korea where the "yusin" dictatorship has been revived, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It says:
					
					 South Korea has been reduced to the world's worst tundra of human rights and the biggest grave yard of democracy as "yusin" dictatorship has revived.
					
					 The south Korean puppet conservative regime is desperately invoking the fascist SL to stay in power as it seized power by telling all sorts of lies and employing gimmicks and intrigues and conducting a fraudulent election.
					
					 Due to such actions, innocent people desirous of social progress, democracy and peaceful reunification are now being punished after being branded as "those following the north".
					
					 It is an intolerable insult to human justice and conscience that there exists even in the highly civilized 21st century such a medieval unethical law that has reduced south Korea to a dark land under fascism and a graveyard of human rights.
					
					 There can be no democracy in south Korea where the fascist dictatorship rides roughshod, and human rights abuses can never cease as long as such draconian SL reigns there.
					
					 It is shameless and reckless, indeed, for the south Korean ruling forces to get frantic with provocations against the DPRK, blaming it for its "human rights" issue.
					
					 They are sadly mistaken if they think they can dampen the desire of the people for achieving reunification through alliance with the north and realize their wild dream of long-term office by resorting to such outdated repressive means as the SL.

articles.title: S. Korean Religious Organizations Declare Protest Action
articles.content:
S. Korean Religious Organizations Declare Protest Action
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Representatives of the five religious orders in the Kwangju area of south Korea including Buddhism, Chondoism and Catholics held a meeting in Kwangju on Nov. 28.
					 At the meeting they said that what is taking place after the mass on the situation held by the Jonju Parish Priests Group of the south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice in demand of the resignation of the present chief executive is obviously a crackdown on religion.
					
					 Re-clarifying the stand of the five religious orders, they declared they would not overlook the authorities' act of suppressing religionists by branding the mass on the situation as the "one following the north".

articles.title: S. Korean Forces' Reckless Crackdown Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Forces' Reckless Crackdown Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea issued a statement on Nov. 29 denouncing the puppet forces for their reckless crackdown.
					 The statement said that the court issued an arrest warrant for the chairman in charge of literary and art of the organization on Nov. 28 on charges of violating the "Security Law".
					
					 The legal action was meant to support the present "government" and the Intelligence Service in their moves to eliminate the "forces following the north". This is a typical case of fabrication and crackdown under the pretext of security to turn the table in favor of them, the statement noted.
					
					 The statement called for an immediate stop to the unreasonable crackdown upon patriotic figures.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Slammed for Acting against People's Will
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Slammed for Acting against People's Will
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Representatives of civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Women's Solidarity and the Solidarity for Progress held a press conference in Seoul on Nov. 28 at which they denounced the puppet group for acting against the people's will.
					 They recalled representatives of all social standings handed to Chongwadae a written request reflecting the will of the people condemning the present regime for its misrule violating democracy, reneging on the commitments and driving the people's living into destitution. But Chongwadae has given no answer to it, they charged.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime is denying the call of the people for probing the truth about the election rigging and intensifying the suppression of civic and public organizations while getting hell-bent on privatizing public sectors, they held, and went on:
					
					 It is also pressing forward the construction of the Jeju naval base to be used by the U.S. forces despite the military tensions on the Korean Peninsula. This means that it would further intensify the treacherous rule threatening peace.
					
					 If the authorities continue turning down the people's demands, the people will launch a large-scale protest campaign against Chongwadae on Dec. 7.
					
					 At the end of the press conference they handed the "written request of people to government" to Chongwadae.

articles.title: Action against Dissolution of Progressive Political Party Declared
articles.content:
Action against Dissolution of Progressive Political Party Declared
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The representative of the Unified Progressive Party of south Korea and lawmakers affiliated to it held a press conference outside the building of Chongwadae on Nov. 29 and declared the action against the puppet group's moves to dissolve the political party.
					 At the press conference, the speakers denounced the authorities for terming the party the "forces following the north" for the mere reason that it called for enforcing the politics for the workers and farmers, ensuring the political freedom and achieving the reconciliation, cooperation and reunification of the south and the north.
					
					 Querying that those who do not follow Park Geun Hye are the "forces following the north", they said the moves to dissolve the party should be stopped at once as it is aimed to eliminate political dissidents.
					
					 They declared the start of new action to ensure democracy outside the building of Chongwadae.
					
					 They stressed that they would carry on an unflinching struggle in protest against the dictatorship regime which violates democracy, works to fix the division and deteriorates the people's livelihood.
					
					 The regime's continued act aimed to revive the "yusin" dictatorship and suppress the people will meet nothing but the resistance by the masses as in the past, they warned.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime of Suppression of Just Struggle of Peasants under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime of Suppression of Just Struggle of Peasants under Fire 
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea released a statement on Sunday in protest against the south Korean conservative regime's repressive rule and unpopular policies.
					 The statement accused the conservative group of driving many peasants in south Korea into a pitfall of death by enforcing a policy to ruin agriculture. It continued:
					
					 Nevertheless, the puppet regime is brutally cracking down upon the peasants who came out in protest actions for protecting their right to existence, deploring the ruined agriculture, after groundlessly branding them as "forces following the north".
					
					 The conservative group is desperately working to mislead the public opinion through the racket for eliminating the "forces following the north" and tide over its ruling crisis by mobilizing fascist repressive forces. But this is nothing but last-ditch efforts of those on deathbed.
					
					 Only when the poisonous roots of "yusin" are totally pulled out and the south Korean society plagued by the unpopular rule is brought down, will it be possible to pave a wide avenue for independence, democracy and reunification desired by the popular masses and ensure the existence of peasants in south Korea.
					
					 All agricultural workers in the DPRK as part of the same nation and as the same peasants cultivating this land will always positively support the just struggle of the south Korean peasants who have risen up to win back justice and democracy and protect their cradle.

articles.title: S. Korean PM's Pro-Japanese Act Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean PM's Pro-Japanese Act Assailed
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Kyunghyang Daily News on Nov. 26 in an editorial denounced the puppet prime minister of south Korea for his pro-Japanese act.
					 The "prime minister", during an interpellation as regards the history textbook whitewashing Japan's aggression of Korea at the "National Assembly," fully revealed his true colors as a pro-Japanese stooge and a descendant of the "yusin" dictatorship, the editorial said.
					
					 He let loose a spate of reckless remarks because the "Saenuri Party" and ultra-right conservative group, after declaring a war of history, did not want to deny the embellishing of the Japanese imperialists' policy of aggression and praises of Syngman Rhee and Park Chung-Hee in the history textbooks. 
					
					 Those who wrote the history textbooks and the "prime minister" would have wanted to turn their faces away from the history of the Japanese imperialists' aggression of Korea. This is the conservative forces' understanding of history as they propped up the era of Syngman Rhee and Park Chung-Hee. Japan's distortion of history is directly linked with the conservative group's understanding of history.
					
					 It is skeptical how the "prime minister" would approach Japan's distortion of history textbook and the issue of sexual slavery.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces' Anti-DPRK Campaign Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces' Anti-DPRK Campaign Denounced
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo carried a commentary on November 28 to denounce the puppet group's campaign for eliminating "forces following the north" that has become unprecedentedly fierce.
					 The commentary said:
					
					 Anyone opposed to the politics of Park Geun Hye is being branded as "one following the north" without exception just as was the case under the "yusin regime".
					
					 Theory that prevails in south Korea is one who is not "following Park" is the "one following the north". It is the height of brutality.
					
					 Suspicion growing in society is how come there are so many "forces following the north" in south Korea. But no correct answer is given.
					
					 Amid repressive whirlwind that swept across south Korea, even a religionist had been branded as "person following the north" in the wake of the similar happening to a lawmaker.
					
					 Under the present "government" those who stand for justice are smeared as "forces following the north" and they have been subject to legal actions being linked with the "revolution". What the people experienced in this course is that its system is so much orderly.
					
					 The conservative media take the lead in building up the public opinion and then Chongwadae and the "Saenuri Party" take turns to make public their opinions. This is followed by the use of force by conservative organization and at last the suppression by public security organ. This has become a formula.
					
					 Until when and to where will the racket for eliminating the "forces following the north" continue?
					
					 According to Park Geun Hye-style political theory, a "religion following the north" can also shortly appear in south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Flailed for Trying Hard to Conceal Truth about Election Rigging
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Flailed for Trying Hard to Conceal Truth about Election Rigging
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., on Nov. 25 carried an article contributed by a Korean in the U.S. denouncing the south Korean puppet chief executive for working hard to conceal the truth about the interference in the illegal election.
					 Koreans in the U.S. are becoming increasingly vocal demanding the resignation of Park Geun Hye, terming the past "presidential election" fraudulent election in which government power interfered, the article said.
					
					 It accused Park Geun Hye of sidestepping all sorts of frauds during the election, ruthlessly cracking down on those disturbing her and making desperate efforts to evade the blame for it at any cost.
					
					 The behavior of the chief executive to conceal the truth about the case is the height of shamelessness, it stressed.

articles.title: Truth behind Case of People's Revolutionary Party Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Truth behind Case of People's Revolutionary Party Disclosed in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Facts that the case of the People's Revolutionary Party orchestrated by U.S. imperialism and the Park Chung-Hee puppet clique was a sheer lie and fabrication are being disclosed one after another in south Korea, according to a south Korean internet news.
					 On Nov. 28 the Seoul High Court declared 9 men not guilty in a retrial. They had been sentenced to prison terms on charges of the violation of "anti-communist law," etc.
					
					 Saying the People's Revolutionary Party had not been proved to be an "organization with the north's programme", the court ruled that there was lack of ground to declare them guilty.
					
					 The committee for proving the truth behind the suspected incidents drew a conclusion in 2002 that the above-said case was cooked up by torture. The court also declared the victims of the case not guilty in 2007.
					
					 The case was fabricated by traitor Park Chung-Hee in a bid to suppress the patriotic parties, organizations and personages who stood against his military fascist rule and sycophantic and treacherous policies.
					
					 The blood-tainted "yusin" fascist and dictatorial rule is being revived by Park Geun Hye, chief executive of south Korea.

articles.title: Support Rate for S. Korean Chief Executive Drops
articles.content:
Support Rate for S. Korean Chief Executive Drops
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The support rate for the present chief executive of south Korea is continuing to drop, according to the Nov. 29 issue of the south Korean paper Kyunghyang Daily News.
					 According to the results of the opinion poll conducted by a survey institution among 1 208 adults across south Korea from Nov. 25 to 28, the support rate for the chief executive showed another 4 percent drop as compared with that one week ago. This was caused by the tough countermeasure taken by the ruling forces against the mass on the situation held by the south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice, the survey institution said.
					
					 An increase from last week was also reported in the number of respondents who made negative evaluation of the chief executive for reasons that she did not keep commitments and practices dictatorship.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Denying Historical Fact
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Denying Historical Fact 
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. on November 27 made public a commentary in denunciation of the south Korean puppet authorities running amuck in the campaign to suppress the "forces following the north" while denying the historical fact. 
					 The commentary referred to the fact that a Catholic priest in south Korea insisted that the Yonphyong Island shelling was caused by the south Korean authorities' war drills only to face the conservatives' frantic repressive racket of branding him as "Red" and describing his act as "behavior of following the north".
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The Yonphyong Island shelling was caused as south Korea unilaterally opened fire into the north, while insisting on the "northern limit line" which even the U.S. does not recognize and which does not coincide with international law.
					
					 The south side's shelling drill was bait aimed to induce military conflict by irritating the north. 
					
					 Had the south side not staged the shelling drill, the Yonphyong Island case would not have occurred. 
					
					 The Catholic priest was branded as a "priest following the north" as he gave objective explanation of the fact. Violation of reasonable thinking by the oppressors has become all the more blatant under the present "government". 
					
					 All the people who are set to probe the truth will become target for hunting the "forces following the north" as long as the Park Geun Hye regime bereft of common sense and reason and its followers run amuck. 
					
					 The end of Park Geun Hye will be more miserable and her followers will not be able to escape severe punishment if they continue such evildoings.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered by Syrian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered by Syrian Political Party
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria on November 25.
					 Adnan Ismail, deputy general secretary of the party, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events to introduce the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in India
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in India
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The Indian national committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated with due ceremony in New Delhi on November 22.
					 Sitaram Yechury, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist), was elected chairman of the national committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events including a remembrance meeting on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Brazilian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted a special write-up illustrated with a portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il on its website on November 25 on the occasion of the second anniversary of his demise.
					 The committee said in its article titled "Immortal exploits performed by Kim Jong Il in accomplishing the global cause of independence" that history knows not a few great persons who made contributions to the progressive development of humankind but did not know a great man who could match Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a great man who clearly indicated the way of the human cause of independence, it noted and went on:
					
					 He authored a lot of famous works including "On the Juche Idea," comprehensively systemizing and developing in depth the Juche idea, the idea guiding the cause of independence.
					
					 He led the global cause of independence to victory with his outstanding leadership ability.
					
					 It was the most important of his exploits that he smashed the imperialists' offensive to stifle the DPRK and firmly defended Korean-style socialism and peace and security in the region by enforcing the unique Songun politics.
					
					 The DPRK's capability for self-defence has remarkably grown stronger thanks to his Songun politics.
					
					 Its deterrence for self-defence made the imperialists' racket for nuclear threat end in smoke.
					
					 He dynamically promoted the advance of the global cause of independence through his energetic external activities to build a new world guided by the idea of independence, friendship and peace.
					
					 His exploits performed for accomplishing the global cause of independence will shine long with progressive humankind.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Kyrgyz Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Kyrgyz Political Party Leader 
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity - "Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party and chief of the Kyrgyz Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, released a statement on Nov. 25 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Noting Kim Jong Il's demise was the great loss to the Korean people and the world progressives, the statement said:
					
					 When socialism collapsed in various countries and the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces clamored for "total finis of socialism", Kim Jong Il defended socialism and turned the DPRK into a strong fortress of independence against imperialism by enforcing the unique Songun politics. He was an iron-willed brilliant commander who protected the peace and security not only of the Korean Peninsula and but of the rest of the world.
					
					 Although he passed away, his cause is firmly carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is leading the Korean people to build a thriving nation, true to the idea and intention of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He has further consolidated the single-minded unity of the whole society by pursuing the politics of love for people and aroused the entire people to work miracles and make innovations in the drive for stepping up economic construction and improving people's standard of living.
					
					 As there are the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un and the people single-mindedly united around him, the thriving socialist nation where people's happiness is brought into full bloom will certainly be built in the DPRK.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Romania, DR Congo
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Romania, DR Congo
						
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Romania and DR Congo on Nov. 22 and 26 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They were a remembrance meeting by the Socialist Party of Romania and a lecture by the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il developed the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and performed great exploits for the Korean revolution and the global cause of independence.
					
					 In particular, in the 1990s when the imperialists were running wild in their moves against socialism, he published famous works scientifically proving the justice of the cause of socialism. He wisely led the struggle for the victory of socialism with his original Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 It is totally ascribable to his outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership that the socialist construction has dynamically advanced in the DPRK.
					
					 His life was dedicated to the victory of the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence.
					
					 His undying exploits will always be remembered by not only the Korean people but the Socialist Party of Romania and its members.
					
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, vice-chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo, in his lecture on the theme of "Veteran statesman Kim Jong Il" lauded the exploits he performed on behalf of the era and history.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con el embajador polaco
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con el embajador polaco
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 2 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Polonia en Corea, Edward Pietrzyk, quien le hizo una visita de despedida.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju averigua en el terreno las gestiones de la ciudad de Kanggye
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju averigua en el terreno las gestiones de la ciudad de Kanggye
						
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El primer ministro Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno las gestiones de varios dominios de la ciudad de Kanggye. 
					Tras escuchar las explicaciones sobre el proyecto general de construccion de la ciudad de Kanggye, recien elaborado tomando en cuenta las instrucciones del Mariscal Kim Jong Un dadas en el terreno, el premier recorrio el campo de construccion del Palacio de Deportes de la provincia de Jagang, el Area de Recreo del Pueblo Jangjagang, la arboleda folklorica de uso docente de Inphung y otros lugares donde hizo conocimiento detallado de la urbanizacion y el cuidado de la ciudad.
					
					En la Fabrica de Vino de Kanggye, la Granja Porcina de Kanggye, la Granja Avicola de Hungju y la Fabrica de Elaboracion de Madera de Kanggye, se entero de la capacidad productiva, la modernizacion tecnica, el estado de suministro de piensos de ganado y la produccion y convoco la reunion consultiva de los funcionarios correspondientes. 
					
					En la ocasion el premier destaco que las fabricas y empresas de la ciudad deben glorificar las imborrables proezas de direccion de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, establecer la correcta estrategia de gestion de acuerdo con la realidad y asentar sobre la base cientifica la administracion empresarial. 
					
					Se tomaron las medidas para elevar la competitividad de los productos y la eficiencia de uso de la madera, cientifizar la cria y cuidado de ganados y suministrar suficientemente los materiales necesarios a la construccion urbana. 
					
					Con anterioridad, el premier paso revista a la mina carbonifera de Hwaphung del Complejo Carbonifero de la Region de Anju y otros lugares y convoco una reunion de consulta. 
					
					La reunion dio enfasis en la posicion y papel del Complejo y discutio las medidas para concentrar las fuerzas en aumentar la produccion de carbon y suministrar con prioridad en los dominios relacionados la electricidad y los materiales necesarios a la produccion de carbon.

articles.title: RPDC se incorporara a esfuerzos internacionales por seguridad maritima
articles.content:
RPDC se incorporara a esfuerzos internacionales por seguridad maritima
						
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En la 28a reunion de la asamblea general la Organizacion Maritima Internacional (OMI), sesionada el 26 de noviembre, pronuncio discurso el jefe de la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El se refirio primero a la importancia de la presente asamblea, a los exitos logrados en el periodo de examen en la rama de seguridad maritima y a los trabajos del Secretariado de la OMI para mejorar las labores de esta organizacion conforme a la demanda e intereses de los paises miembros. 
					
					La realidad de hoy exige elevar mas la responsabilidad y papel de la OMI para garantizar la seguridad de transporte maritimo, que ocupa posicion importante en el comercio exterior mundial, y preparar el limpio ambiente del mar, dijo y enumero los problemas que se presentan ante la OMI y sus miembros. 
					
					Bajo la sabia guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, en la RPDC se libra la marcha general de todo el pueblo para levantar un Estado prospero socialista, destaco y continuo: 
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC toma las medidas practicas para dinamizar la economia nacional en su conjunto con la meta de acelerar la construccion economica y mejorar cuanto antes las condiciones de la vida del pueblo y canaliza grandes fuerzas al desarrollo de transporte maritimo que tiene gran importancia en el desarrollo economico. 
					
					En particular, alcanzo una serie de exitos en la ejecucion de los principales convenios y reglamentos, aprobados nuevamente por la OMI. 
					
					Logro avance en la implementacion del Convenio de Manila de 2012, enmendo los reglamentos nacionales correspondientes para cumplir los convenios y reglas internacionales revisados y entrados en vigor y elevo el papel del aparato de certificado maritimo, de modo que se mejorara el sistema de control cualitativo de las labores administrativas del mar. 
					
					En cuanto a la estructura de busqueda y rescate en el mar, se desplegaron en 25 puntos adecuados de los Mares Este y Oeste las estaciones de radio de ondas ultracortas que se pondran en funcionamiento desde el ano proximo como parte de los preparativos para establecer un perfecto sistema de distincion y persecucion de barcos a larga distancia. 
					
					En la rama de seguridad maritima, la RPDC ingreso el 15 de octubre al Convenio de la Organizacion Internacional de Satelites Moviles y ahora cumple la mision de pais miembro en estrecha colaboracion con esta organizacion. 
					
					En el dominio de proteccion del ambiente maritimo, se promueven las labores para preparar el limpio ambiente maritimo de acuerdo con el aumento de inversiones estatales en la proteccion medioambiental. 
					
					En lo adelante tambien, el gobierno de la RPDC desarrollara mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con los paises miembros de la OMI, segun el ideal de su invariable politica exterior, o sea, la independencia, la paz y la amistad, y se incorporara activamente a los esfuerzos internacionales por la seguridad de navegacion maritima y la proteccion del ambiente maritimo.

articles.title: Portavoz del FCC denuncia resurgimiento de dictadura de "Yusin" en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz del FCC denuncia resurgimiento de dictadura de "Yusin" en Sur de Corea 
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Central de la Federacion de Cristianos de Corea, en su declaracion fechada 2, califica de crimen antinacional nunca tolerable la represion despiadada de las autoridades de titeres surcoreanos contra las fuerzas democraticas y progresistas y el hostigamiento medieval a las supuestas "fuerzas pro-Norte". 
					La realidad actual de la sociedad surcoreana hace recordar la era de la dictadura de "Yusin" en que se hacian una "politica estatal" el anticomunismo y la confrontacion fratricida y se veia pisoteada la aspiracion a la unidad nacional, revela la nota y continua: 
					
					Los restos de la dictadura de "Yusin" tomaron el poder con fraudes y tratan de dar marcha atras a la historia. 
					
					Si se toleran esas acciones, el Sur de Corea retrocedera indudablemente a la oscura edad media haciendose zona inhabitable en que se rompe el deseo de la democratizacion. 
					
					La historia de martirios del Sur de Corea ensena la leccion de que la defensa de la justicia es la via de existencia y la rendicion ante la injusticia causa la muerte. 
					
					Los cristianos de conciencia deben levantarse con valentia en la sagrada y justa lucha contra la horda de satanicos que convierte el suelo surcoreano en la escena de danza macabra de fascismo, impide la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales y acarrea los desastres de guerra nuclear a esta tierra. 
					
					La banda de malos, que rehusa la opinion publica y rechaza a los connacionales, sera castigada sin falta por el Dios y la historia.
					
					En el futuro tambien, los cristianos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea estaran siempre al lado de los correligionarios surcoreanos, levantados para construir un nuevo mundo democratizado, apreciando el amor, la justicia y la paz.

articles.title: Kim Mi Gyong ocupa primer lugar en campeonato internacional de maraton de Macao
articles.content:
Kim Mi Gyong ocupa primer lugar en campeonato internacional de maraton de Macao
						
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- La jugadora de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Mi Gyong, ocupo el primer lugar en el campeonato internacional de maraton de Macao de 2013 al entrar el dia primero en la meta con el record de 2h:36m:32s.
					En el presente certamen que tiene lugar por 32a vez, compitieron 6 mil jugadores y aficionados, aproximadamente, provenientes de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y otros 46 paises y regiones. 
					
					Se realizaron las competencias de maraton, semi-maraton y mini-maraton.
